snippet: On average, each visitor to the region in 2007-8 carried 9.5 nonnative seeds, although scientists carried far more each than tourists, a study found.
abstract: On average, each visitor to the region in 2007-8 carried 9.5 nonnative seeds, although scientists carried far more each than tourists, a study found.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Alien Plants in Antarctica
